results.title: Metformin decreased myocardial fibrosis and apoptosis in hyperhomocysteinemia -induced cardiac hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: However, whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protects against @<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@HHcy@@@-induced @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ is unclear.

results.title: Metformin inhibited homocysteine-induced upregulation of endothelin receptors through the Sirt1/NF-kappaB signaling pathway in vascular smooth muscle cells.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ significantly inhibited the @<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@HHcy@@@-induced blood pressure elevation.

results.title: Association of vitamin B12 deficiency in people with type 2 diabetes on metformin and without metformin: a multicenter study, Karachi, Pakistan
results.text_hl: Subjects with @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@B12 deficiency@@@ and insufficiency with @<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@hyperhomocysteinemia@@@ (>=15) were found in 19 (76%) micromol/L and 69 (60.5%) micromol/L in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users compared with 6 (100%) micromol/L and 57 (73.1%) mumol/L in non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users, respectively.

citations.NLM: Miyan Z, Waris N, MIBD. Association of vitamin B12 deficiency in people with type 2 diabetes on metformin and without metformin: a multicenter study, Karachi, Pakistan BMJ Open Diabetes Res Care. 2020 May;8(1):. PMID: 32448786

results.title: Metformin role in Parkinson's disease: a double-sword effect.
results.text_hl: However, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may harm @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD neuropathology@@@ by inducing @<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@hyperhomocysteinemia@@@ and @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@deficiency of folate and B12@@@.

results.title: Atherogenic Effect of Homocysteine, a Biomarker of Inflammation and Its Treatment.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@Hyperhomocysteinemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@HHcy@@@) is an independent risk factor for @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@.

results.title: SERUM VITAMIN B12, FOLIC ACID, HOMOCYSTEINE, AND GLYCEMIC CONTROL MARKERS IN PATIENTS WITH TYPE 2 DIABETES BY METFORMIN AND OTHER ORAL ANTIDIABETIC MEDICATIONS.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@) is a prevalent @DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic disorder@@@ associated with long-term complications. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, the first-line therapy for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@, has been implicated in @DISEASE_Malabsorption_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D008286 @@@nutrient malabsorption@@@, particularly @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_B_12 @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014805 @@@vitamin B12@@@, potentially leading to @<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@hyperhomocysteinemia@@@ and related @DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic dysfunction@@@.

citations.NLM: Al-Samydai A, Oraibi A, Altamimi S, Al-Hussaniy H, Zainee H, Kareem L, Abdulhuseen S, Alghnaimawi F, Al-Saeedi A, Hamed H, Adnan M. SERUM VITAMIN B12, FOLIC ACID, HOMOCYSTEINE, AND GLYCEMIC CONTROL MARKERS IN PATIENTS WITH TYPE 2 DIABETES BY METFORMIN AND OTHER ORAL ANTIDIABETIC MEDICATIONS. Georgian Med News. 2025 May;(362):92-97. PMID: 40737654

results.title: Relationship between metformin use, vitamin B12 deficiency, hyperhomocysteinemia and vascular complications in patients with type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: Relationship between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use, @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@vitamin B12 deficiency@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@hyperhomocysteinemia@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetic_Angiopathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003925 @@@vascular complications@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@.

results.title: Hyperhomocysteinemia, deep vein thrombosis and vitamin B12 deficiency in a metformin-treated diabetic patient.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@Vitamin B12 deficiency@@@ may be induced by long-term use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, which may in turn lead to @<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@hyperhomocysteinemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Lin HY, Chung CY, Chang CS, Wang ML, Lin JS, Shen MC. Hyperhomocysteinemia, deep vein thrombosis and vitamin B12 deficiency in a metformin-treated diabetic patient. J Formos Med Assoc. 2007 Sep;106(9):774-8. PMID: 17908667

results.title: Homocysteine and cardiovascular risk in patients with diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Some studies show higher than normal fasting and postmethionine load levels of plasma @CHEMICAL_Homocysteine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006710 @@@homocysteine@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, particularly in those with @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@nephropathy@@@ and microalbuminutia. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use and low plasma B vitamins are other potential mechanisms resulting in @<m>DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@hyperhomocysteinemia@@@ in these @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Yeromenko Y, Lavie L, Levy Y. Homocysteine and cardiovascular risk in patients with diabetes mellitus. Nutr Metab Cardiovasc Dis. 2001 Apr;11(2):108-16. PMID: 11434188
citations.BibTeX: @article{11434188, title={Homocysteine and cardiovascular risk in patients with diabetes mellitus.}, author={Yeromenko Y and Lavie L and Levy Y}, journal={Nutr Metab Cardiovasc Dis}, volume={11}, number={2}, pages={108-16}}
